title: Error at login
body:
For some reason I keep getting this "unknown error" warning when I am try to login to LOL, I get to 58% and that's it. Can someone please tell me what is going on 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
It sounds like this is actually happening in the patcher while your patcher is trying to grab the newest League files. If this is the case, your issue is likely caused by an *unstable connection* to our patching servers. Working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should help in resolving this, as this is commonly caused by network settings that conflict with League.

Let me know if this fixed it!
